title: flowers
desc: I love the way of rain drops falling on the leaves because that is the way you loved me

title: birds
desc: Look at the stars in the sky,that's all my wishes especiallly for you

title: sora no kiseki
desc: 'Good night,my dear.' Even if I know you will never hear it

title: originals
desc: When all the lights are off,when all the noise are slient,the only thing in my mind is you

title: aquas
desc: I like your long long shadow.It just seems you are unhappy to say goodbye to me

title: the cat
desc: Time would heal almost all wounds. If your wounds have not been healed up, please wait for a short while

title: piano
desc: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass. it's about learning to dance in the rain

title: the sky
desc: Brief is life, but love is long

title: pokemon
desc: If we are children of the time, you can stay there, sit together, listen to those who never old stories side HaoShou slowly

title: flowers and cats
desc: When his weapons win he is defeated himself
